item.title: Teaching Tutor - Unibo
item.description: A complete list of all the courses of Alma Mater Studiorum - Universit√† di Bologna in which I have been a teaching tutor: Software Engineering (Second cycle degree program: Digital Transformation Management) Software Engineering for Intelligent Distributed Systems (Second cycle degree program: Computer Engineering and Science) Digital Design Principles and Computer Architecture (First cycle degree program: Biomedical Engineering & Electronics Engineering for Energy and Information) Computer Science (First cycle degree program: Statistical Sciences) Machine Learning Systems for Data Science (Second cycle degree program: Statistical Sciences)
